keywords: ['folk song', 'bagpipes', 'scottish tenor drum', 'bass drum', 'tambourine', 'accordion', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This Scottish folk song features bagpipes playing the main melody. This is accompanied by an accordion playing the same melody in harmony. A Scottish tenor drum plays a marching beat. A bass drum plays strokes on the count. A tambourine plays a beat in the background. This song can be played in a Scottish folk programme.
